name: Captain Verrack (V)
Lore: 'Mon Calamari computer technician. Expert in power systems. His skills are desperately needed by Rebel fleet. Gunner.',
Text: 'Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. While aboard your starship, adds 1 to its total weapon destiny. Whenever you hit a starship here, opponent loses 1 Force. During battle, may lose 1 Force to cancel [Coruscant] Watch Your Back!.',
